msItem.title: Ma'athir i 'Alamgiri.
msItem.note: Second blank page before text, note describing the book signed Briggs Dhooha 1819. Front flyleaf, recto, and back flyleaf, verso, impressions of small rectangular seal of Thakur Parshad, dated 1238 and 13. Inside front cover, ex libris slip: Lieut. Col. Briggs. A History of Aurangzib from A.H. 1067 to 1118. Illuminated panel above opening of text, ruled margins, headings and punctuation in red.
msItem.incipit: Intikhab-i saha'ih-i ijad-i uns u jan

origin.p: Shahjahanabad. 14 Rabi' I 1230, regnal year 9 of Muhammad Akbar Shah.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of India, Mughal period, Aurangzib.
